wan: Grin aydia dɛn we nɔ gɛt kɔlɔ dɔn rili slip
my bot dɔn ful-ɔp wit fish dɛn
a: My hovercraft is full of eels

wan: bɔku bɔku fayn tin dɛn fɔ yu
a: many many happy returns of the day

wan: wetin dɛn tink se go apin
tin dɛn we fɔ mek wi gladi
wan dɛn we wok na bot
we di san dɔn go dɔŋ
dɔn dɔn di padi biznɛs wantɛm wantɛm
i dɔn te we wi si
fɔ ɛvri fɔ tin dɛn we yu kɔnt na wan lɛf
nɔ gɛt pɔsin fɔ ɛp am
yu mared ɔ yu nɔ mared
de mek lɛk se yu lɛk am
a nɔ ɔndastand wetin yu min
a: I don't understand what you mean

wan: a op yu de go fayn
tek wan pɔsin bɛtɛ pas ɔda pɔsin
tek wan pɔsin impɔtant pas ɔda pɔsin
pɔsin we de rayt fɔ nyuspepa
pɔsin we de trit strenja fayn
wok we dɛn nɔ pe yu
tin we dɛn yuz milk mek
uman we in man dɔn day
pɔsin we nɔ du tin tret
pikin we nɔ gɛt mama ɛn papa
Tɛnki we yu peshɛnt fɔ lɛ wi chɛk di ship in lod
a: Thank you for your patience while we investigate shipment

wan: tɛnki we yu yuz wi ap
Wi wok: fɔ mek ɔlman ɔlsay na di wɔl ebul fɔ ɔndastand dɛnsɛf ɛn tɔk to dɛnsɛf.
a: Our mission: to enable everyone, everywhere to understand the world and express themselves across languages.

wan: Wi wok: fɔ ɔganayz ɔltin na di wɔl ɛn mek ɔlman ebul fɛn am ɛn yuz am
a: Our mission: to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.

wan: wetin yu de du fɔ wok
a: what do you do for a living

wan: wetin yu de du jɔs jɔs naw
a: what are you doing right now

wan: wetin yu lɛf fɔ yu pikin
